description:
Sometimes, a model simply demands a place in your collection – no questions asked. A few years ago, while working on my Black Legion force, I was inspired by Garfy’s brilliant paint guides (insert link?). So, when the plastic Chaos Daemon Prince kit debuted in 2022, I knew it had to be part of my army. But then came the challenge: choosing his loadout!

The post Showcase: Black Legion Daemon Prince appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: Black Legion Daemon Prince
